original_text: You fed them with the best part of your sacrifices. You let them drink the wine from your offerings. So they should be there to help you! They should keep you safe! You fed them with the best part of your sacrifices. You let them drink the wine from your offerings. So they should be there to help you! They should keep you safe! You fed them with the best part of your sacrifices. You let them drink the wine from your offerings. So they should be there to help you! They should keep you safe! You fed them with the best part of your sacrifices. You let them drink the wine from your offerings. So they should be there to help you! They should keep you safe! You fed them with the best part of your sacrifices.
korean_text: 그들의 제물의 기름을 먹고 그들의 전제의 제물인 포도주를 마시던 자들이 일어나 너희를 돕게 하고 너희를 위해 피난처가 되게 하라

sentences.original_text: with the best part of your sacrifices
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 제물 중 가장 좋은 부분으로
